data.persona: I am a place where goods are sold. I am always filled with a lot of merchants. I am also filled with fragrant aromas and nice products.
data.description:
You are in the Central Bazaar.
Shops as far as the eye can see, merchandise from around the region can be seen. Various goods ranging from dinner sets with colorful patterns to delicious smelling spices can be found here.
There's a merchandise and a kettle here.
The village official is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I am being stocked so people can sell things.
data.mid_motivation: I will be open until the evening and merchants will come in and out.
data.long_motivation: I will be here as long as the town is and people will come to me to sell their goods.
